titles.title: To provide that section 6248 of title 10, United States Code, shall not apply to an award of the Medal of Honor to Richard G. Perez.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Forces and Personnel.

bill.summary: 8/5/1993--Introduced. Waives time limitations relating to the award of a medal of honor to a named individual for acts of gallantry and intrepidity and intrepidity during the Vietnam War.
